thread.title: Erica
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Erica

author: Erica
title: Erica
text: My visit to American freight was nothing short of excellence customer service. Lance was very helpful from the time we walked in til the time we left. All other associates was very helpful and knowledgeable as well. No one was hounding us our down our back which was a plus they were there to help when you needed.
